subject: Official Letter From Mr. Don Irwin
body:
From The Desk
JP Morgan Chase Bank
270 Park Avenue New York,
NY 10017, United States
Office Email:  chasebnkdesk@accountant.com

Date: 02/29/2024


Attention:  Sir

This is to inform you that the U.S Government is awarding people who have
fallen into the hands of INTERNET victims with the sum of $10.7MUSD and
your name and your  details also appeals and that was the main reason why
you have been contacted by us.

All the necessary arrangements have been made' we are waiting for the
required Documents fee of ($375.00) for your *Demonstrating you ( *
Taylor    * ) according to the English Inheritance Payment Laws.

The Readiness of your Fund helps to prepare for a future, large-scale
Transfer. The Remittance department is waiting for their Services as soon
as they receive your Deposit Clearance fee.

*This enable the Paying Bank MD updates your Fund Account unlock Code
immediately for the release of your Payment Funds.*

The best method you can easily make the deposit of $375.00 as requires_?

Via *Bank Transfer deposit Or *Gift Cards and *BitCoin* receivers Links as
you will be direct in your returning message according to your preferable
method As the ( *"Remittance Department)* are waiting for their Services. I

Get back to my Office as soon as my message is acknowledged by you and the

Thanks
Mr. Don Irwin
Chase Bank Managing Director
Office Email:  chasebnkdesk@accountant.com
Private Email:  jpmorganwj641850@gmail.com

subject: Re: Official Letter From Mr. Don Irwin
body:
Hello Mr. Don Irwin,

Thank you for reaching out to me from JP Morgan Chase Bank. I appreciate the information you have shared regarding the Government awarding people who have been victims of internet scams. Can you please provide more details on how the process works and what steps I need to take to claim this award?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Taylor

subject: Re: Official Letter From Mr. Don Irwin / Do The Needful And Stop Wasting My Time.
body:
[image: Chase Bank opening two Huntsville area locations | WHNT.com]


From The Desk
JP Morgan Chase Bank
270 Park Avenue New York,
NY 10017, United States
Office Email:  chasebnkdesk@accountant.com
Private Email:  jpmorganwj641850@gmail.com


Date: 03/01/2024


Attention: Sir

Thanks to your email, the activation of your Chase Bank ATM VISA CARD works
immediately. You will receive your ATM VISA CARD by the FedEx dispatcher
officer who will be coming to your house address to hand over your package
to you in person at your doorstep.  Kindly take your ATM VISA CARD to any
ATM Machines around you to ACTIVATE your PIN CODE and start making
withdrawals because your ATM VISA CARD access pin code will be provided to
you by our desk once the FedEx Courier Express delivers your parcel to
you.  I hereby advise you to go to any Bitcoin stores or Bitcoin ATM
Machine to send the $450 Dollars only because that is the fastest meaning
we order our customers to make payment. This is the reason.

You can Head to the location of the Bitcoin ATM. Insert the amount of cash
needed for the transaction, similar to inserting money in a regular ATM.
Provide the address below of the Bitcoin wallet you want the crypto to be
sent to. Confirm the final amount, and check over the details before you
finish your transaction.


Bitcoin ATMs allow a safe and easy way to transfer funds from your wallet
to someone else's. All you need to do is insert the amount you wish to send
and input the recipient's digital wallet address. Then you can follow the
easy-to-understand instructions on the kiosk to ensure the funds have been
transferred.


You are directed to make the payment through our Bitcoins Wallet Address
stated below:

*HERE IS OUR BITCOINS WALLET ADDRESS*


*3NYfrmXzqgyEUKhWNm2gTqUxp19uZMgSiK*


*AMOUNT EXPECTED: $450.00 DOLLARS ONLY*

As soon as the ( *"Remittance Department")* confirms the payment, your fund
will be unlocked for immediate release to you with immediate actions. Get
back to me with the Bitcoins payment receipt for confirmation /
documentation purposes.
Thanks
Mr. Don Irwin
Chase Bank Managing Director
Office Email:  chasebnkdesk@accountant.com
Private Email:  jpmorganwj641850@gmail.com
